forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
